about: I am Lakshmipriya RajeshKanna, a software engineer with a Master’s from Drexel University. I specialize in full-stack web development, DevOps, and AI-powered systems. I am experienced in Python, Java, JavaScript, React, Spring Boot, SQL, and cloud platforms like AWS.
skills: Python, Java, JavaScript, SQL, C++, C#, React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express.js, Spring Boot, Flask, REST API, Kafka, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, AWS EC2, S3, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Neo4j, JUnit, Mockito, Jest, TDD, XP, Agile
education: Master of Science in Software Engineering, Drexel University, Philadelphia, PA (GPA: 3.72); Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology, Sona College of Technology, Salem, India (GPA: 3.8)
fun: I love baking, especially cakes and cupcakes. Experimenting with new flavors and decorating treats is one of my favorite hobbies.

highlights: Containerized applications using Docker
Automated cloud infrastructure provisioning with Terraform
Implemented monitoring and logging with Grafana
Built multi-page Streamlit dashboards for Amazon analytics
Developed Neo4j referral system with BigQuery and GDS algorithms
Experimented with GraphRAG agent integrating structured and unstructured data with HuggingFace models
Engineered client portal for shipment tracking and invoicing with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL
Managed AWS deployments with Docker and CI/CD pipelines
Implemented JWT authentication and IAM control

projects.name: Sonic Touch – AI Powered E-commerce for Visually Impaired Users
projects.technologies: React, Node.js, Tailwind, MongoDB, Rasa, AWS, Docker
highlights: Deployed voice-enabled e-commerce platform, improving accessibility engagement by 85%
Integrated AI-powered assistant with Rasa for conversational interactions
Containerized full-stack application for cloud deployment

projects.name: Dungeon Crawler Game Engine
projects.technologies: Java, GitLab CI/CD, Design Patterns, TDD, XP, Automation Testing
highlights: Designed Java-based game with GUI, player movement, enemies, and power-ups
Applied TDD and XP practices achieving 95%+ unit test coverage
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitLab ensuring reliable deployments

projects.name: Chess Board Move Validation
projects.technologies: Java, Jira, TDD, Sprint Planning, Automation Testing
highlights: Created a college project validating chess moves within a 10-day deadline
Used Jira for task management, created a project charter, and prioritized essential project features, reducing bug occurrence by 20% through rigorous quality assurance practices (TDD)
Implemented sprint planning methodologies to manage tasks and meet deadlines
Conducted software testing protocols, achieving a 94% accuracy rate, ensuring robust performance

projects.name: Face Mask Detection and Verification System
highlights: Prepared and preprocessed dataset for high-quality training
Trained ResNet50 for mask detection and performed face verification using cosine similarity

projects.name: Ethereum Token Development
projects.technologies: JavaScript, Solidity, Smart Contracts, MetaMask, ERC-20
highlights: Created custom ERC-20 token reducing gas fees by 40%
Integrated MetaMask for seamless user transactions with 99% success rate
Coordinated tasks with Kanban for weekly sprints, task execution, and independent workflow management

projects.name: What Should I Eat? – Dietary Assistance Web Application (Capstone)
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, Edamam API, Google OAuth, Google Cloud, GoDaddy
highlights: Developed a full-stack meal recommendation app using the Edamam API, increasing user engagement by 40%
Implemented secure login with Google OAuth and OTP verification, raising adoption rate by 25%
Optimized backend performance with caching, load balancing, and scheduled Cron jobs, reducing response time by 30%
Deployed frontend/backend via GoDaddy hosting and Google Cloud, ensuring high availability and global accessibility

projects.name: Car Parking System – Android Reservation App
projects.technologies: Java,Android, MVVM, Google Maps API, PHP
highlights: Architected native Android app using MVVM architecture for parking reservations, improving modularity by 40%
Connected Google Maps API for real-time location views, increasing user interaction by 60%
Created PHP backend for live booking and slot management, enhancing reliability by 35%
Implemented real-time updates and payment confirmation, reducing search times by 50%
